entry.title: Awesome Slack Updates on Oct 11 - Oct 17, 2021
entry.content:
üìù ¬† Lists

  • Community-Built Libraries - Slack-curated list of community open-source libraries
  • Slack App Directory - Official directory of publicly available Slack apps

üé® ¬† Themes

  • Slack Themes - A Slack sidebar theme browser
  • Sweet Themes Are Made of These - Website for sharing Slack custom palettes

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / C#

  • margiebot (‚≠ê123) - A .NET library designed to make building bots for Slack fast, easy, and fun
  • Slack.Webhooks (‚≠ê172) - A library to work with Slack webhooks more easily
  • SlackAPI (‚≠ê454) - A third-party implementation of Slack's API written in C#

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Java

  • java-slack-sdk (‚≠ê587) - Slack's official Java framework for building Slack apps

‚öôÔ∏è ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / Java

  • simple-slack-api (‚≠ê471) - A Slack client library in Java

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / JavaScript/TypeScript

  • bolt-js (‚≠ê2.8k) - Slack's official JavaScript framework for building Slack apps
  • jsx-slack (‚≠ê480) - Build JSON object for Slack Block Kit surfaces from JSX
  • node-slack-sdk (‚≠ê3.3k) - Slack's official SDK for Node.js
  • slack-block-builder (‚≠ê597) - Lightweight Node.js library for building Slack Block Kit UIs, with a declarative syntax inspired by SwiftUI

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / PHP

  • SlackBundle (‚≠ê39) - SlackBundle for Symfony2
  • slack-php-app-framework (‚≠ê48) - Robust PHP framework for building Slack apps in PHP
  • slack-php-block-kit (‚≠ê29) - Fluent interface for composing Slack Block Kit messages and modals in PHP
  • slack-php-socket-mode (‚≠ê10) - A Socket Mode implementation for slack-php-app-framework (‚≠ê48)
  • slack-php-slick (‚≠ê7) - Dependency-free micro-framework for building Slack apps in PHP

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Python

  • blockkit (‚≠ê84) - A fast way to build Block Kit interfaces in Python
  • bolt-python (‚≠ê1.2k) - Slack's official Python framework for building Slack apps
  • python-slack-events-api (‚≠ê345) - Slack Events API adapter for Python
  • python-slack-sdk (‚≠ê3.9k) - Slack's official SDK for Python
  • slackblocks (‚≠ê68) - Python API for building Slack Block Kit messages
  • slack-php-api (‚≠ê245) - PHP Slack client based on the official OpenAPI specification
  • slashbot (‚≠ê17) - An easy way to create slash commands using AWS Lambda functions

‚öôÔ∏è ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / Python

  • slacker-cli (‚≠ê184) - Messages to slack from the command line
  • tasks-app (‚≠ê100) - Simple task management app produced by Slack
  • slackbot (‚≠ê1.3k) - A chat bot for Slack
  • wee-slack (‚≠ê2.6k) - A WeeChat plugin for Slack

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Ruby

  • slack-ruby-block-kit (‚≠ê74) - A ruby wrapper for Slack's Block Kit
  • slack-ruby-bot-server (‚≠ê268) - Ruby library for building Slack applications

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Rust

  • slack-morphism-rust (‚≠ê193) - A modern async Slack API client for Rust

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Swift

  • SwiftBlocksUI (‚≠ê70) - Interactive Slack messages and modals using a SwiftUI-like declarative style

‚öôÔ∏è ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / CoffeeScript

  • jinora (‚≠ê87) - Slack webhook app to create anonymous public channels

‚öôÔ∏è ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / JavaScript/Typescript

  • definition-app (‚≠ê24) - App for storing and accessing company-specific phrases
  • slack-github-action (‚≠ê1.2k) - Send data into Slack using this GitHub Action
  • slack-reporting-tool (‚≠ê16) - App that allows team members to report offensive messages
  • tesla-slack (‚≠ê29) - Track your Tesla from Slack

‚öôÔ∏è ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / PHP

  • MantisBT-Slack (‚≠ê47) - MantisBT plugin to send bug updates to Slack
  • monolog (‚≠ê21k) - Sends your logs to Slack

‚öôÔ∏è ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / Ruby

  • slack-gamebot (‚≠ê130) - A game bot for Slack
  • snarkov (‚≠ê26) - Sinatra-based Markov bot for Slack
  • tickbot (‚≠ê12) - Simple team time tracking reminder
  • trebekbot (‚≠ê159) - A Jeopardy! bot for Slack
entry.summary: 44 awesome projects updated on Oct 11 - Oct 17, 2021

entry.title: Awesome Slack Updates on Mar 23 - Mar 29, 2015
entry.content:
üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Erlang

  • slacker (‚≠ê57) - Erlang Slack REST API wrapper

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Go

  • webhook (‚≠ê11k) - Easily run commands in response to HTTP webhook requests from Slack

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Python

  • django-slack (‚≠ê242) - Slack integration for Django, using the templating engine to generate messages

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / R

  • slackr (‚≠ê304) - A package to send webhook API messages to Slack channels/users from R

üõ†Ô∏è ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Ruby

  • slack-notifier (‚≠ê1.5k) - A simple wrapper for posting to Slack
  • slack-notify (‚≠ê94) - Send notifications to Slack
  • slack-poster (‚≠ê51) - Simple gem to post messages on Slack using webhooks
entry.summary: 7 awesome projects updated on Mar 23 - Mar 29, 2015
